mapper.select: select count(DISTINCT universityName) as schoolNumber,count(*) as majorNumber from (select majorType,batch,universityId,majorCode from zgk_university_major_enrolling_plan pp where pp.areaId=330000 and pp.year=2016 ) tmp INNER join zgk_zj_3in7 zz on tmp.majorCode=zz.majorCode and tmp.universityId=zz.universityId and tmp.majorType=zz.eduLevel where zz.selectSubject like CONCAT('%', #{subject1} , '%') or zz.selectSubject like CONCAT('%', #{subject2} , '%') or zz.selectSubject like CONCAT('%', #{subject3} , '%') or zz.selectCount=0
